presets.tasks_backlog:
filter by function !task.isDone
filter by function !task.file.property('complete')
filter by function task.file.hasProperty('kind') 
filter by function task.file.property('kind') != 'big7'
filter by function \
    const fileStatus = task.file.property('status')[0]; \
    const statuses = ['âœ… done', 'ðŸ›‘ blocked']; \
    return !statuses.includes(fileStatus);
filter by function \
    const tags = task.file.property('tags'); \
    return !tags.includes('#template');

group by function task.file.property('category')
limit groups to 10

sort by urgency
sort by due
sort by priority
presets.tasks_sprint:
filter by function !task.isDone
filter by function !task.file.property('complete')
filter by function task.file.hasProperty('kind') 
filter by function task.file.property('kind') == 'sprint'
filter by function \
    const fileStatus = task.file.property('status')[0]; \
    const statuses = ['ðŸŸ¨ progress']; \
    return statuses.includes(fileStatus);
filter by function \
    const tags = task.file.property('tags'); \
    return !tags.includes('#template');

sort by urgency
sort by due
sort by priority
presets.hide_date_fields:
# Hide any values for all date fields
hide due date
hide scheduled date
hide start date
hide created date
hide done date
hide cancelled date
presets.hide_non_date_fields:
# Hide all the non-date fields, but not tags
hide id
hide depends on
hide recurrence rule
hide on completion
hide priority
presets.hide_query_elements:
# Hide postpone, edit and backinks
hide postpone button
hide edit button
hide backlinks
presets.hide_everything:
# Hide everything except description and any tags
preset hide_date_fields
preset hide_non_date_fields
preset hide_query_elements
